TopicTitle: Can I merge/group parts in terms of staging?

Articles.Content:
Hey!

Is it possible to group/merge parts in staging. I am not talking about the major groups titled with numbers rather then the groups within the major groups.

Say I have a 8x4 small engines which all fire at the same time. Those clog up my staging during assembly enormously. Can I just group them in a way that they collapse?

Thanks in advance!
